str2: A primary particle of emphasis or qualification.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
(a) (as adj.) enslaved, (b) (as noun) a (male) slave. From deo; a slave.
A female slave, bonds-maid. Feminine of doulos; a female slave.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: Or ekchuno ek-khoo'-no from ek and cheo; to pour forth; figuratively, to bestow.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
That, that one there, yonder. From ekei; that one (neuter) thing); often intensified by the article prefixed.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From prophetes; to foretell events, divine, speak under inspiration, exercise the prophetic office.
